name: Air Gyro Aviation
about: At Air Gyro Aviation, we specialize in providing comprehensive and safe gyroplane training to aspiring pilots. Our experienced instructors, certified by the FAA, ensure that students receive top-notch instruction in both flight and ground school. We adhere to international standards, collaborating with organizations like the FAA, IAPGT, and PRA to deliver high-quality training. Our fleet includes second-generation gyrocopters, meticulously maintained for optimal safety. We offer introductory flights, private, commercial, and instructor certifications, with a focus on safety and enjoyment. Whether you're transitioning from another aircraft type or new to aviation, our supportive environment and expert guidance will help you become a skilled and confident gyroplane pilot. Join us to experience the unique thrill of gyroplane flying.
